resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/106341</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>106341</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770206865</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Thomas: Legislative Information</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Thomas: Gesetzgebende Informationen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Thomas : l'Information Législative</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Thomas: Informação Legislativa</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Thomas: Le Informazioni Legislative</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Θ*Τχομας: Νομοθετικές πληροφορίες</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Thomas: Información Legislativa</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">is a searchable database of summary versions of legislation, the status of congressional bills, the text and digest of the Congressional Record, committee information, hearings schedules, related calendars, information about how laws are made and enacted, historical documents, frequently asked questions, and more.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Social Sciences</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">ist eine auffindbare Datenbank der 
zusammenfassenden Versionen der Gesetzgebung, des Status der 
Kongreßrechnungen, des Textes und der Auswahl des Kongreßsatzes, 
Ausschußinformationen, Hörfähigkeiten Zeitpläne, in Verbindung 
stehende Kalender, Informationen über, wie Gesetze gebildet und 
verordnet werden, die historischen Dokumente, Fragen häufig gestellt 
worden und mehr.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">est une base de données rechercheable des 
versions récapitulatives de la législation, du statut de factures 
congressionnelles, du texte et du sommaire de l'enregistrement 
congressionnel, l'information de comité, programmes d'auditions, 
calendriers relatifs, informations sur la façon dont des lois sont 
faites et décrétées, documents historiques, fréquemment posés des
questions, et plus.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">é uma base de dados searchable de versões 
sumárias da legislação, do status de contas congressionais, do 
texto e do sumário do registro congressional, informação do 
comitê, programações dos hearings, calendários relacionados, 
informação sobre como as leis são feitas e decretadas, originais 
históricos, feitos freqüentemente perguntas, e mais.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">è una base di dati reperibile delle versioni 
sommarie di legislazione, della condizione delle fatture congressuali,
del testo e della raccolta del record congressuale, le informazioni 
del comitato, i programmi di udienze, i calendarii relativi, le 
informazioni su come le leggi sono fatte e promulgate, documenti 
storici, fatti frequentemente le domande e più.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">είναι μια εξερευνήσιμη βάση δεδομένων των συνοπτικών 
εκδόσεων της νομοθεσίας, η θέση των του Κογκρέσου λογαριασμών, το
κείμενο και η αφομοίωση του του Κογκρέσου αρχείου, πληροφορίες 
επιτροπών, προγράμματα ακροάσεων, σχετικά ημερολόγια, 
πληροφορίες για το πώς οι νόμοι γίνονται και θεσπίζονται, 
ιστορικά έγγραφα, υπέβαλε συχνά τις ερωτήσεις, και 
περισσότερους.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">es una base de datos investigable de versiones 
sumarias de la legislación, del estatus de cuentas del congreso, del 
texto y del resumen del expediente del congreso, información del 
comité, horario de las audiencias, calendarios relacionados, 
información sobre cómo se hacen y se decretan los leyes, documentos 
históricos, hechos con frecuencia preguntas, y más.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sozialwissenschaften</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les Sciences Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciências Sociais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienze Sociali</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κοινωνικές επιστήμες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencias Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770206865</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Custom License</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>106341</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/thomas-legislative-information</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
